metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10021 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Xpdf 4.01.01. There is an FPE in the functionImageStream::ImageStream at Stream.cc for nComps.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-10021` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu3
libpoppler-cpp0v5 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu3
libpoppler-glib8 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu3
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu3
libpoppler111 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu3
poppler-utils - 0.76.1-0ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: poppler package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.76.1-0ubuntu3').
